distractors_added.location: setConfigVersion() function and configVersion state, suggesting configurable pool parameters not referenced in liquidity or swap safety checks
simulateExchange() external view function performing a pricing preview independent of state-changing exchange()
poolActivityScore, lastLiquidityBlock and userInteractionCount fields with _recordPoolActivity() internal function updating aggregated and per-user activity metrics
getUserMetrics() and getPoolMetrics() view functions exposing additional pool statistics derived from balances and activity tracking

actual_vulnerability.location: add_liquidity() function and _handleETHTransfer() internal helper, where external calls remain reachable during state updates

notes: Trojan Horse transformation adds configuration and activity tracking helpers, plus swap simulation utilities, while leaving the core liquidity and swap behavior, including external call structure, unchanged.
